name: Thia AI
summary:
· Created a desktop-native AutoML application, streamlining ML training for enhanced accessibility and reduced costs.
· Architected a comprehensive, multi-tier system comprising an Electron and React UI platform, a Python-based ML system with TensorFlow and Flask, and a Nest.js, Prisma, and MongoDB back-end server.
· Integrated OAuth for authentication, authorization, and payment APIs, along with quota APIs for efficient usage management and controlled user access.
skills: React, TypeScript, Electron, Python, Flask, TensorFlow, MongoDB, Prisma, SQLite
